text: Bush Christmas is a 1983 Australian family drama movie directed by Henri Safran and is the second adaption of the novel by Ralph Smart and Mary Cathcart Borer. It stars Nicole Kidman, John Ewart, John Howard, Mark Spain. ==Other websites== * *Bush Christmas at Oz Movies Category:1983 drama movies Category:1980s family movies Category:Australian family movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Movies directed by Henri Safran
title: Bush Christmas
